name: little-time
description: Minimalist timestamp manipulator and formatter inspired by moment.js
author: David Calhoun (https://github.com/davidcalhoun)

scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run npm-publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run npm-publish
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run npm-publish
scripts.npm-publish: npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.bump: ! npm outdated && npm update && npm audit fix || echo 'Package up to date'
